name: anime-bundle
description: A platform to watch animes right on your desktop.

scripts.dev:electron: npm run transpile:electron && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.clean: rmdir dist-electron && rmdir dist-react && rmdir dist
scripts.dist:mac: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --mac --arm64
scripts.dist:win: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --win --x64
scripts.dist:linux: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --linux --x64
